text: The Ambassador of Switzerland to Sri Lanka HE Mr. Heinz Walker- Nederkoorn made a call on to the State Minister of Defence Hon. Ruwan Wijewardene yesterday (20th Thursday, July).During the meeting a cordial discussion was held between the State Minister and the Swiss Ambassador on matters of bilateral importance and mutual relevance.Defence Attach of the Switzerland Embassy Colonel (GS) Christof Gertsch was also present at the occasion.The Ambassador of Switzerland to Sri Lanka HE Mr. Heinz Walker- Nederkoorn made a call on to the State Minister of Defence Hon. Ruwan Wijewardene yesterday (20th Thursday, July).During the meeting a cordial discussion was held between the State Minister and the Swiss Ambassador on matters of bilateral importance and mutual relevance.Defence Attach of the Switzerland Embassy Colonel (GS) Christof Gertsch was also present at the occasion.
title: Ambassador of Switzerland meets State Minister
